name: Pacific Surf Designs
overview:
We at Pacific Surf Designs specialize in designing and building sheet wave water attractions for the waterpark, entertainment, and hotel industries as well as providing tailored solutions for other private and public sectors.

Influenced by the exciting action sports industry, our attractions add the exhilarating medium of water to surface environments sought out by surfers, skateboarders, snowboarders, bodyboarders, skimboarders and other boardriders. By staying focused on serving these users, our attractions are in the unique position of being able to captivate and excite the important 10- to 35-year-old market, drawing them back time and time again to create a steady stream of repeat customers.

Our innovative designs are focused on safety, reliability and fun to keep your customers entertained with the most cutting edge products in the industry in an environment that is user friendly and easy to maintain. With years of experience building sheet ow water attractions, we are dedicated to working with you on every detail of your project, from design through construction management, to ensure that a seamless installation is followed by years of enjoyment for you and your customers.
